contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of January, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superi- or Court is VACATED, and the case is REMANDED to the Superior Court for it to consider Respondent’s remaining issues. See Beneficial Consumer Discount Co. v. Vukman, 621 Pa. 192, 77 A.3d 547 (2013).
